title: Loft like penthouse 4 BR/2.5 BA ! Near 6 corners! MUST SEE!
posting_body: Massive top floor 4 bedroom 2 full bathroom & 2 half bathroom penthouse in the perfect Bucktown location.
Nearly 3,200 square feet of living space all on one level, sitting at the top of a gorgeous vintage brick building.
The main living area is over 30 feet wide, allowing for the creation of a stunning multi-faceted space that overlooks the skyline and tree-line Wabansia street.
Eastern and Southern exposures fill the space with natural light all year long.
The sleek, black kitchen has just been remodeled and opens to the living space.
Plenty of room for dining, multiple seating areas, in a large open concept setting.
White painted wood floors & exposed brick walls throughout.
Primary suite is bright and big, with a large walk-in closet and newly remodeled bathroom.
Great city views from the master bedroom.
Large laundry room & powder room conveniently located off the main hallway.
The retail tenant on the ground level is Olivia's Market; perhaps the perfect neighborhood store for fresh everyday provisions.
Just steps from Damen shopping, dining, and the CTA blue line station.
* 14 ft ceilings, gas fireplace, stainless steel kitchen appliances, over the range vent, and granite countertops.
* Main bedroom has large closet with organizers.
* Modern loft with fully enclosed bedrooms.
* Easy access to North Ave expressway entrance/exit.
* Damen Blue line subway stop is steps away.
Text or call 773.403.2787 mention Wabansia 4 bed
